# 3rd Party Libraries

The following libraries are required to build the source:

* ML_Lib: Programmed by me, so it's included.
* OpenAL: Not sure, but probably: version 1.1 (This has been compiled out using L3D_WITH_OPENAL_AUDIO=0.)
* Expat: Version 2.01 (Use git clone with --recurive to get a version that works.)
* Newton Game Dynamics: Not sure, but has: copyright 2000-2004 (This has been compiled out using L3D_WITH_NEWTONGD_PHYSICS=0)
* libogg: version 1.1.3 (Use git clone with --recurive to get a version that works.)
* libvorbis: version 1.1.2 (Use git clone with --recurive to get a version that works.)
* zlib: version 1.2.3 (Use git clone with --recurive to get a version that works.)
